Package Network.Queries

Class ConceptQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.Queries.Query
      • Network.Queries.ConceptQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConceptQuery
extends Query
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class allows for posing queries regarding the concepts and individuals. For a given concept one can ask for
    - all individuals
    - sub/superconcepts
    - results of some application function.
    The navigation through the concept hierarchy can be controlled by three parameters:
    - down (default true) moves down the hierarchy
    - all (default false) just moves one level
    - breadthFirst (default false) controls breadth-first or depth-first search.
    The results are deliverd as stream. The stream can be filtered before delivering. Created by ohlbach on 29.02.16.
    See Also:

      • addFilter

        public boolean addFilter​(java.lang.String code)
        adds a filter for filtering the answers. Filtering the answers at the server side reduces the network load. An example for a filter code is: "concept.applicationName.startsWith(\"T\");"
        Parameters:
        code - the Groovy code for the filter. The parameter is "concept".
        Returns:
        true if the code was compiled

      • addFinder

        public boolean addFinder​(java.lang.String resultType,
                         java.lang.String code)
        adds a finder. A finder traverses the concept tree, and collects all non-null results of the finder code. An example for a finder code is: "concept.applicationName.charAt(0)" collects the first characters of all concepts in the search area.
        Parameters:
        code - the Groovy code for the finder. The parameter is "concept".
        resultType - the result-type of the finder code.
        Returns:
        true if the code was compiled

      • answer

        public java.lang.Object answer​(Context context)
        answers the query. The answer can be:
        - null if there is no answer
        - a stream of concept ids for an HIERARCHY-query
        - a stream of objects for a FIND-query
        - an error message (as string) if something went wrong.
        Specified by:
        answer in class Query
        Parameters:
        context - the context from where to get the concepts
        Returns:
        the answer of the query.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a description of the query.
